channel.title: Botswana on David D. Hofmann
channel.description: Recent content in Botswana on David D. Hofmann

item.title: A Fair Share to De-Snare
item.description: During my last season of field work in Botswana, we encountered a pack of wild dogs where some individuals carried a wire snare around their neck. Luckily, with the aid of a wildlife veterinarian, we were able to remove the snares.
